Description:
A long strand of grass-like algae catches your eye, and, for some reason, you find it intimidating.

Something strange is going on here, but you can’t quite put your finger on it.

You’ve never seen this type of algae growing at such depths, and it sparks your curiosity.
DescriptionAction: Will you get close to check them?
